thread.title: BRIEF-BW LPG: Option to Acquire 6 million shares in Dorian LPG
thread.title_full: BRIEF-BW LPG: Option to Acquire 6 million shares in Dorian LPG | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-BW LPG: Option to Acquire 6 million shares in Dorian LPG
text:
Aug 28 BW LPG Ltd :
* BW LPG Limited after careful deliberation, has elected not to exercise the option granted from a subsidiary of BW Group Limited, to acquire 6.0 million shares in New York Stock Exchange listed Dorian LPG Ltd Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
